page.title: 18DRAGONVILLE INDUSTRIAL EST.2
page.content: Mattesons Meats is the second of the larger companies to establish themselves, while Joshua Wilsons opened their food wholesale regional distribution centre in the mid nineteen sixties. On the debit side , however, Bicklers have ceased to operate and their buildings are now being utilised as the base for a youth training scheme. The most significant recent developments are twofold. Already in operation is aself contained estate of 36 small units which have been built upon the former sports fieldof Mackays. To open in the autumn of this year is a Fine Fare hyper-market on land which has remained overgrown and neglected for many years and is adjacent to Mackays Carpet Factory.
